data.description: User-centered software design including principles and methods for understanding user needs, designing and prototyping interface solutions, and evaluating their usability covered through lectures and hands-on in-class activities.  Meets withCOMP SCI 570.
data.title: FUNDAMENTALS OF HUMAN-COMPUTER INTERACTION

data.description: User-centered software design: (1) principles of and methods for understanding user needs; designing and prototyping interface solutions; and evaluating their usability, (2) their applications in designing multiple types of interfaces through group projects.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO HUMAN-COMPUTER INTERACTION
